title: Agent Registry Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating the agent registry configuration

agents.description: Map of agent ID to agent configuration

type.description: Agent type determining its role in the system

description.description: Human-readable description of the agent's purpose and expertise

capabilities.description: List of capabilities this agent possesses

model.description: The Claude model to use for this agent

tools.description: List of tools this agent can use

can_lead.description: Domains this agent can lead (empty array means no leadership)

system_prompt.description: System prompt that defines the agent's behavior and expertise

stable.description: Whether this agent configuration is stable and production-ready

extends.description: Agent ID to inherit capabilities and configuration from
